name: Rookie Hero
description:
Rookie Hero is an action-platformer game with procedural levels, many stages, hordes of enemies and lots lots lots of stats.

Game

The goal is to rescue a prisoner captured by enemies.

Our superiors will drop us in a hostile zone, and we must endure the enemy attacks until the prisoner appears. At that time we will have to touch it to defend it.

Every enemy we kill will increase our combat power a little. If we fully charge it when we locate the prisoner, we will become invincible for a few seconds.

The prisoner can die, although only the explosions or the final boss can hurt him.

The game will save the statistics of all our games, except if we die. In that case, it will only save our failure.

Experience

Ultratumba have EXPERIENCES, an achievement open library designed for GP2X and PC. You can win this achievements (1000 points, 21 exps) if you install the Exp Application.

Language

English and Spanish.
